Description: Ability to write clean, efficient code that solves problems correctly.
Level 1: Basic: Code quality below Senior expectations. Struggles with complex problems.
Level 2: Intermediate: Solid coding but lacks the polish expected at Senior level.
Level 3: Advanced: Excellent code quality. Handles complex algorithms with ease.
Level 4: Expert: Exceptional coding ability. Could lead technical interviews.

Description: Understanding of system architecture and ability to design scalable solutions.
Level 1: Basic: Cannot design systems at scale. Missing key architectural knowledge.
Level 2: Intermediate: Designs basic systems but misses non-functional requirements.
Level 3: Advanced: Designs robust, scalable systems with proper tradeoff analysis.
Level 4: Expert: Architects industry-leading solutions. Deep distributed systems expertise.

Description: Analytical thinking and ability to break down complex problems.
Level 2: Intermediate: Adequate problem solving but takes longer than expected.
Level 3: Advanced: Efficiently solves complex problems with elegant approaches.
Level 4: Expert: Exceptional problem solver. Creates frameworks others can follow.

Description: Deep knowledge in specific technical domains relevant to the role.
Level 1: Basic: Knowledge gaps in expected Senior areas.
Level 2: Intermediate: Solid fundamentals but not deep enough for Senior role.
Level 3: Advanced: Strong technical depth across multiple domains.
Level 4: Expert: Industry expert. Publishes, speaks, or contributes to open source.

Description: Ability to lead technical initiatives and mentor junior engineers.
Level 2: Intermediate: Some mentoring but limited scope or impact.
Level 3: Advanced: Actively leads initiatives and grows junior engineers.
Level 4: Expert: Transforms team capabilities. Creates lasting technical culture.

Description: Ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Level 2: Intermediate: Works well with immediate team but struggles cross-functionally.
Level 3: Advanced: Strong partnerships across engineering, product, and design.
Level 4: Expert: Trusted advisor across the organization. Resolves complex conflicts.
